EmailTemplate.textOnly:
On July 25 from 5:00 â€“ 10:00 PM ET, NCR will be undergoing a scheduled maintenance update for the NCR Vitalcast Digital Signage solution. During this time, all customers will be unable to make any updates to the solution, including content, schedule or pricing updates and all logins through the Vitalcast Admin or Web-Admin will be disabled.
